DOC.brief_summary: This trial assess analgesic efficacy safety new central analgesic subject pain due diabetic peripheral neuropathy ( DPN ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Painful Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy With GRT3983Y
DOC.criteria: Symmetrical painful diabetic peripheral neuropathy History hypersensitivity , allergy contraindication opioids acetaminophen Confounding painful condition Significant vascular disease History risk seizure Chronic disease might effect drug absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion Female subject pregnant breastfeed Evidence history alcohol , medication , drug abuse
